availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer. Virigina native. Married to Louisa A. Caldwell. Father of John F., James T., and Mary L. Caldwell. Farmer in Taylor County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned seventeen enslaved people in Taylor County in 1860. Farmer in Taylor County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Division 1, 185B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, p. 54.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, District 1, p. 7.
